Note: Make sure you run npm install and grunt from the commandline first to build /dist/css-polyfills.js

This is a sandbox which uses the built version of css-polyfills. Click the Run It! button to apply the CSS to the HTML.

Edit the CSS:

.success { background-color: lightgreen; }

Preview:

Edit the HTML:

<div class="success"> If this is green it worked (after clicking "Run it!") </div>
